snippet: LISS--Elliott R. 7/6/1931 - 5/18/2004. Beloved husband, father, grandfather, and friend. You remain loved and missed. Your laugh and smile are always with us. Dotty, Laurie, Matthew, and Timothy 1/3...
lead_paragraph: LISS--Elliott R. 7/6/1931 - 5/18/2004. Beloved husband, father, grandfather, and friend. You remain loved and missed. Your laugh and smile are always with us. Dotty, Laurie, Matthew, and Timothy 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  LISS, ELLIOTT R
